info.title: Avi DebugVirtualService Object API
info.description:
CLI
```
- debug virtualservice <key>
- show debug virtualservice <key>
```

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: object name

parameters.name: refers_to
parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that refers to another Avi resource. Its syntax is refers_to=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all virtual services referring to pool p1 will be refers_to=pool:pool_p1_uuid

parameters.name: referred_by
parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that are referred by another Avi resource. Its syntax is referred_by=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all pools referred_by virtual service vs1 - referred_by=virtualservice:vs_vs1_uuid

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: List of fields to be returned for the resource. Some fields like name, URL, uuid etc. are always returned.

parameters.name: include_name
parameters.description: All the Avi REST reference URIs have a name suffix as URI#name. It is useful to get the referenced resource name without performing get on that object.

parameters.name: skip_default
parameters.description: Default values are not set.

parameters.name: join_subresources
parameters.description: It automatically returns additional dependent resources like runtime. Eg. join_subresources=runtime.

parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant
parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header

parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant-UUID
parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header UUID

parameters.name: X-Avi-Version
parameters.description: The caller is required to set Avi Version Header to the expected version of configuration. The response from the controller will provide and accept data according to the specified version. The controller will reject POST and PUT requests where the data is not compatible with the specified version.

parameters.name: X-CSRFToken
parameters.description: Avi Controller may send back CSRF token in the response cookies. The caller should update the request headers with this token else controller will reject requests.

parameters.name: cloud_uuid
parameters.description: Filter to get objects that belongs to a specific cloud using its uuid. Eg. cloud_uuid=cloud-xyz.

parameters.name: cloud_ref.name
parameters.description: Filter to get objects that belongs to a specific cloud usings its name. This uses cloud name rather than uuid. Eg. cloud_ref.name=Default-Cloud.

parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant
parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header

parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant-UUID
parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header UUID

parameters.description: The caller is required to set Avi Version Header to the expected version of configuration. The response from the controller will provide and accept data according to the specified version. The controller will reject POST and PUT requests where the data is not compatible with the specified version.

parameters.name: X-CSRFToken
parameters.description: Avi Controller may send back CSRF token in the response cookies. The caller should update the request headers with this token else controller will reject requests.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the object to fetch

absolute_size.description: Maximum size in MB. Set 0 for avi default size. Allowed values are 100-512000. Special values are 0 - 'AVI_DEFAULT'. Field introduced in 18.2.8.

percentage_size.description: Limits capture to percentage of free disk space. Set 0 for avi default size. Allowed values are 0-75. Field introduced in 18.2.8.

capture_ip.description: Per packet IP filter. Matches with source and destination address. Curently not applicable for DebugServiceEngine. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

capture_ipc.description: Capture filter for SE IPC. Not applicable for Debug Virtual Service. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

dst_port_end.description: Destination Port range filter. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

dst_port_start.description: Destination Port range filter. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

eth_proto.description: Ethernet Proto filter. Enum options - ETH_TYPE_IPV4. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

ip_proto.description: IP Proto filter. Support for TCP only for now. Enum options - IP_TYPE_TCP. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

src_port.description: Source Port filter. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

tcp_ack.description: TCP ACK flag filter. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

tcp_fin.description: TCP FIN flag filter. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

tcp_push.description: TCP PUSH flag filter. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

tcp_syn.description: TCP SYN flag filter. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

flow_del_probe.description: Flow del probe filter for SE IPC. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

flow_mirror_add.description: Flow mirror add filter for SE IPC. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

flow_mirror_all.description: Filter for all flow mirror SE IPC. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

flow_mirror_del.description: Flow mirror del filter for SE IPC. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

flow_probe.description: Flow probe filter for SE IPC. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

flow_probe_all.description: Filter for all flow probe SE IPC. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

ipc_batched.description: IPC batched filter for SE IPC. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

ipc_rx_req.description: Filter for incoming IPC request. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

ipc_rx_res.description: Filter for incoming IPC response. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

ipc_tx_req.description: Filter for outgoing IPC request. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

ipc_tx_res.description: Filter for outgoing IPC response. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

vs_hb.description: Vs heart beat filter for SE IPC. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

domain_name.description: This field filters the FQDN for Dns debug. Field introduced in 18.2.1.

gslb_service_name.description: This field filters the Gslb service for Dns debug. Field introduced in 18.2.1.

addrs.description: Placeholder for description of property addrs of obj type DebugIpAddr field type str  type object

prefixes.description: Placeholder for description of property prefixes of obj type DebugIpAddr field type str  type object

ranges.description: Placeholder for description of property ranges of obj type DebugIpAddr field type str  type object

_last_modified.description: UNIX time since epoch in microseconds. Units(MICROSECONDS).

capture.description: Placeholder for description of property capture of obj type DebugVirtualService field type str  type boolean

capture_filters.description: Per packet capture filters for Debug Virtual Service. Applies to both frontend and backend packets. Field introduced in 18.2.7.

capture_params.description: Placeholder for description of property capture_params of obj type DebugVirtualService field type str  type object

cloud_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type Cloud.

debug_hm.description: This option controls the capture of Health Monitor flows. Enum options - DEBUG_VS_HM_NONE, DEBUG_VS_HM_ONLY, DEBUG_VS_HM_INCLUDE.

debug_ip.description: Filters all packets of a complete transaction (client and server side), based on client ip.

dns_options.description: Dns debug options. Field introduced in 18.2.1.

flags.description: Placeholder for description of property flags of obj type DebugVirtualService field type str  type object

resync_flows.description: This option re-synchronizes flows between Active-Standby service engines for all the virtual services placed on them. It should be used with caution because as it can cause a flood between Active-Standby. Field introduced in 18.1.3,18.2.1.

se_params.description: Placeholder for description of property se_params of obj type DebugVirtualService field type str  type object

tenant_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type Tenant.

uuid.description: Unique object identifier of the object.

capture_file_size.description: Maximum allowed size of PCAP Capture File per SE. Max(absolute_size, percentage_size) will be final value. Set both to 0 for avi default size. DOS, IPC and DROP pcaps not applicaple. Field introduced in 18.2.8.

duration.description: Number of minutes to capture packets. Use 0 to capture until manually stopped. Special values are 0 - 'infinite'.

enable_ssl_session_key_capture.description: Enable SSL session key capture. Field introduced in 18.2.3.

file_count.description: Number of files to maintain for SE pcap file rotation.file count set to 1 indicates no rotate. Allowed values are 1-10. Field introduced in 20.1.1.

num_pkts.description: Total number of packets to capture.

pcap_ng.description: Enable PcapNg for packet capture. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

pkt_size.description: Number of bytes of each packet to capture. Use 0 to capture the entire packet. Allowed values are 64-1514. Special values are 0 - 'full capture'.

se_refs.description: It is a reference to an object of type ServiceEngine.

flag.description: Enum options - DEBUG_VS_TCP_CONNECTION, DEBUG_VS_TCP_PKT, DEBUG_VS_TCP_APP, DEBUG_VS_TCP_APP_PKT, DEBUG_VS_TCP_RETRANSMIT, DEBUG_VS_TCP_TIMER, DEBUG_VS_TCP_CONN_ERROR, DEBUG_VS_TCP_PKT_ERROR, DEBUG_VS_TCP_REXMT, DEBUG_VS_TCP_ALL, DEBUG_VS_CREDIT, DEBUG_VS_PROXY_CONNECTION, DEBUG_VS_PROXY_PKT, DEBUG_VS_PROXY_ERR, DEBUG_VS_UDP, DEBUG_VS_UDP_PKT, DEBUG_VS_HM, DEBUG_VS_HM_ERR, DEBUG_VS_HM_PKT, DEBUG_VS_HTTP_CORE, DEBUG_VS_HTTP_ALL, DEBUG_VS_CONFIG, DEBUG_VS_EVENTS, DEBUG_VS_HTTP_RULES, DEBUG_VS_HM_EXT, DEBUG_VS_SSL, DEBUG_VS_WAF, DEBUG_VS_DNS, DEBUG_VS_PAA, DEBUG_VS_ALL, DEBUG_VS_ERROR, DEBUG_VS_NONE.

ip_addr.description: Placeholder for description of property ip_addr of obj type IpAddrPrefix field type str  type object

begin.description: Starting IP address of the range.

end.description: Ending IP address of the range.
